attributes.action: write a new manifesto for his Labour Government, out-lining all of the changes he plans to make, and how his Government will differ from Tony Blair's 'New-Labour' manifesto.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In his entering speech to Number 10 Downing Street, Gordon Brown spoke of many changes he plans to make.
We have already saw some of these changes occur, with the formation of his new Cabinet.
It seems only fair that he should create his own Manifesto, for the British people to view and agree on.
